mean_cn: n. 异教；祭礼；狂热的崇拜；  adj. 流行的；风靡一时的
mean_en: a small religious group that is not part of a larger and more accepted religion and that has beliefs regarded by many people as extreme or dangerous
sentence: Many people think that members of this cult worship the Devil.
sentence_trans: 很多人认为这次祭礼的成员崇拜恶魔。
